How do I disable the login sound on ubun: when in system>preferences>sound in the sounds tab there is a dialog that says login
Yea ive been here before, it shows WHAT sounds but I dont see how to disable it..........nvm figured it out
in alerts and sound effects you will find login, it should say default next to it, click it and then a popup will appear on it select disable, and close it and you will no longer play sounds on login
It was hiding, i had to click on the disable
